# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a new monitor without any extension points.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

After using this initializer, call the [doc://com.apple.extensionfoundation/documentation/ExtensionFoundation/AppExtensionPoint/Monitor/addAppExtensionPoint(_:)] method to add an extension point to monitor.

## Creating a monitor

- **init(appExtensionPoint:)**: Creates a new monitor and configures it with the specified extension point.
